import React, { useContext } from 'react' import './product.css' import Context from './data/Context' function Product(props) { const{id,title,price,description,image} =props.dataa const{addtocart,cartitems}=useContext(Context) const cartitemamount=cartitems[id] return (

{title}

{description}

{price}

) } export default Product
